#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

Fox Board G20 based autopilot for mulitrotor craft, from quadcopters to traditional helis


= Details =

I'm building my quadcopter:<br>
- 1 FoxBoard G20 400MHz 64MB RAM<br>
- 4 emax cf 2822<br>
- 4 esc unbranded<br>
- 1 arduimu v2<br>
- 1 minissc pololu<br>
<br>
1 aluminum square tube 1000x10x10 cut and drilled<br>
2 aluminum sheets opportunely cut and drilled<br>
